original_title: National Chamber of Commerce felicitates Past Presidents
original_body_lines: Seated from left: Past Presidents Sunil G. Wijesinha, Asoka Hettigoda, Nirmali Samaratunga, Deshabandu Karu Jayasuriya, Deshabandu Tilak De Zoysa, G.S. Chatoor, Thilak Godamanna, Asela De Livera

Standing from left: Deputy President Kavinda Rajapaksa, Senior Deputy President Anura Warnakulasooriya, Past President Sujeeve Samaraweera, Honorary Treasurer Chamika Godamanna, Honorary Secretary Dr. Lakmal Fernando, President Deepal Nelson
Former Speaker and National Chamber Past President Deshabandu Karu Jayasuriya receiving a token of appreciation from National Chamber President Deepal Nelson
The National Chamber of Commerce for the first time in its 75 year history organised a felicitation ceremony recently for its Past Presidents.
Thirty five Presidents who have given leadership to the Chamber so far were felicitated in a gathering organised at the Royal Colombo Golf Club recently.
